name: Run on Comment After PR Creation

on:
  issue_comment:
    types: [created]
  pull_request:
    types: [opened]

jobs:
  run-on-comment:
    if: |
      github.event_name == 'issue_comment' &&
      github.event.issue.pull_request &&
      contains(github.event.comment.body, '/run-check')
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Print message
        run: echo "Triggered by comment: ${{ github.event.comment.body }}"

  on-pr-created:
    if: github.event_name == 'pull_request' && github.event.action == 'opened'
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: PR opened step
        run: echo "Pull request created!"
